languages.text: {n}Караэль столбенеет. В его взгляде, направленном на Маражая, неподдельный ужас.{/n} "Безумные слуги Цегораха... в союзниках Эзирраеш?" {n}Он оглядывается на соратников, явно сбитых с толку упоминанием Арлекинов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Караэль столбенеет.{/n} "Слуга Цегораха? В союзниках Эзирраэш? Говорят, они вхожи к самому Векту..."
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kharael freezes. There is genuine terror in his gaze directed at Marazhai.{/n} "The mad servants of Cegorach... have allied themselves with the Aezyrraesh?" {n}He looks back at his companions, clearly distraught at the mention of the Harlequins.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael freezes. There is genuine terror in his gaze directed at Marazhai.{/n} "The mad servants of Cegorach... have allied themselves with the Aezyrraesh?" {n}He looks back at his companions, clearly distraught at the mention of the Harlequins.{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kharael erstarrt. Er blickt Marazhai mit echter Todesangst an.{/n} "Die wahnsinnigen Diener von Cegorach ... haben sich mit den Aezyrraesh verbündet?" {n}Er blickt zu seinen Gefährten zurück, offenkundig verstört ob der Erwähnung der Harlekine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael freezes. There is genuine terror in his gaze directed at Marazhai.{/n} "The mad servants of Cegorach... have allied themselves with the Aezyrraesh?" {n}He looks back at his companions, clearly distraught at the mention of the Harlequins.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael erstarrt. Er blickt Marazhai mit echter Todesangst an.{/n} "Die wahnsinnigen Diener von Cegorach ... haben sich mit den Aezyrraesh verbündet?" {n}Er blickt zu seinen Gefährten zurück, offenkundig verstört ob der Erwähnung der Harlekine.{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}卡瑞尔僵住了，盯着玛拉斋的目光中流露出真正的恐惧。{/n}“乔高奇那些疯狂的仆人……居然和艾泽拉什家族结盟了？”{n}他回头看着他的同伴们。很显然，所有人都因为丑角的事情而心烦意乱。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael freezes. There is genuine terror in his gaze directed at Marazhai.{/n} "The mad servants of Cegorach... have allied themselves with the Aezyrraesh?" {n}He looks back at his companions, clearly distraught at the mention of the Harlequins.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}卡瑞尔僵住了，盯着玛拉斋的目光中流露出真正的恐惧。{/n}“乔高奇那些疯狂的仆人……居然和艾泽拉什家族结盟了？”{n}他回头看着他的同伴们。很显然，所有人都因为丑角的事情而心烦意乱。{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kharael se fige. Pétrifié de terreur, il dévisage Marazhai.{/n} « Les serviteurs fous de Cegorach... ont rejoint les Aezyrraesh ? » {n}Il regarde ses compagnons, manifestement inquiets à l'évocation des Arlequins.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael freezes. There is genuine terror in his gaze directed at Marazhai.{/n} "The mad servants of Cegorach... have allied themselves with the Aezyrraesh?" {n}He looks back at his companions, clearly distraught at the mention of the Harlequins.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael se fige. Pétrifié de terreur, il dévisage Marazhai.{/n} « Les serviteurs fous de Cegorach... ont rejoint les Aezyrraesh ? » {n}Il regarde ses compagnons, manifestement inquiets à l'évocation des arlequins.{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kharael se queda paralizado. El terror de la mirada que dirige a Marazhai es genuino.{/n} «Los sirvientes locos de Cegorach... ¿se han aliado con los Aezyrraesh?». {n}Mira a sus compañeros, alterado por la mención de los Arlequines.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael freezes. There is genuine terror in his gaze directed at Marazhai.{/n} "The mad servants of Cegorach... have allied themselves with the Aezyrraesh?" {n}He looks back at his companions, clearly distraught at the mention of the Harlequins.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael se queda paralizado. El terror de la mirada que dirige a Marazhai es genuino.{/n} «Los sirvientes locos de Cegorach... ¿se han aliado con los Aezyrraesh?». {n}Mira a sus compañeros, alterado por la mención de los Arlequines.{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}カラエルが固まる。マラズハイに向けられた視線には、本物の恐怖が浮かんでいた。{/n}「セゴラックのイカれた従者たちが…アエジレシュと同盟を組んだ？」{n}ハーレクィンの言葉に明らかに動揺した様子で、彼は仲間を振り返る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael freezes. There is genuine terror in his gaze directed at Marazhai.{/n} "The mad servants of Cegorach... have allied themselves with the Aezyrraesh?" {n}He looks back at his companions, clearly distraught at the mention of the Harlequins.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カラエルが固まる。マラズハイに向けられた視線には、本物の恐怖が浮かんでいた。{/n}「セゴラックのイカれた従者たちが…アエジレシュと同盟を組んだ？」{n}ハーレクィンの言葉に明らかに動揺した様子で、彼は仲間を振り返る。{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kharael donup kalıyor. Marazhai'a yönelmiş bakışlarında gerçek bir dehşete düşmüşlük görülüyor.{/n} "Cegorach'ın deli hizmetkârları... Aezyrraesh'le müttefik mi olmuş?" {n}Dönüp yoldaşlarına bakıyor. Arlekenlerin adının anılması onu çılgına döndürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael freezes. There is genuine terror in his gaze directed at Marazhai.{/n} "The mad servants of Cegorach... have allied themselves with the Aezyrraesh?" {n}He looks back at his companions, clearly distraught at the mention of the Harlequins.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael donup kalıyor. Marazhai'a yönelmiş bakışlarında gerçek bir dehşete düşmüşlük var.{/n} "Cegorach'ın deli hizmetkârları... Aezyrraesh'le müttefik mi olmuşlar?" {n}Dönüp yoldaşlarına bakıyor. Arlekenlerin adının anılması onu çılgına döndürmüş durumda.{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael
